title: Eternl Monster Swap
caption: Grabs the best price from multiple aggregators for you

dexFees.label: Batcher & Pool Volume fee (DEXs)
dexFees.tooltip: DEXs set a fee to process your order. This is not refundable.

aggregatorFee.label: Service fee
aggregatorFee.tooltip: This is the convenience fee. It helps fund the development of the aggregator and Eternl.

deposit.label: Refundable deposit
deposit.tooltip: A deposit is required to process your order. This amount is returned to your wallet with the tokens you receive.
